projects.title: Robotfrías Web Page
projects.description: Robotfrías is a project focused on developing complete digital solutions: modern websites, custom software, and creative content for brands. It also includes an educational platform offering courses and classes for people who want to start in the tech world.
features: Modern and responsive web development
Custom software creation
Professional digital content production
Courses and lessons for beginners in technology
Comprehensive solutions for entrepreneurs and small businesses
A combined approach between tech services and education

projects.title: En Ruta Ando Website
projects.description: Modern website developed for a Dominican ecotourism company. Its main goal is to provide a clear, attractive and easy-to-navigate digital experience, allowing users to explore routes, excursions and natural activities intuitively. The design communicates professionalism while keeping a fresh visual aesthetic inspired by nature.
features: Simple navigation focused on user experience
Organized section for excursions and activities
Visual design inspired by Dominican nature (greens, earthy tones, large photos)
Well-structured information for comfortable reading
Optimized for mobile devices and tablets
Fast loading times and lightweight structure
System prepared to add more routes and content in the future
Focus on highlighting the company’s safety and professionalism

projects.title: Institutional Website for the Polytechnic
projects.description: Digital platform created to strengthen the institution's online presence, showcasing its academic offer, services, and updates in a clear and organized way. The design prioritizes accessibility and a modern visual structure.
features: Modern and responsive institutional design
Organized academic sections easy to navigate
Structure optimized for students, teachers, and visitors
Well-applied visual hierarchy for better readability
Dynamic sections prepared for news and events
Architecture designed for low maintenance and easy updates
Full optimization for mobiles, tablets, and large screens

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I have always had a strong interest in technology; I loved learning everything related to computers and software, a passion I inherited from my father.
about.p2: I am currently studying web development, deepening my knowledge and skills in programming and digital design.
about.p3: In the future, I plan to study Software Engineering at ITLA, and I enjoy playing chess to train my mind. You can play with me at chess.com.
